data.text:
Tom is responsible for overseeing all aspects of Omni Bridgeway’s investment management, due diligence processes and operations across the Asia Pacific region.

Tom joined Omni Bridgeway in 2017 and built the largest and most respected legal risk finance and management team in the Asian region, before assuming APAC regional leadership. His team is applauded by clients and recognised and awarded by industry participants and commentators.

Before joining Omni Bridgeway, Tom was a senior member of Allen & Overy’s international arbitration and disputes practice in Asia, where he handled complex multi-jurisdictional matters for global businesses across numerous sectors, including financial services, automotive, energy, industrial manufacturing and construction. Prior to this, Tom worked with leading New Zealand law firm, Russell McVeagh, where he represented local and multi-national clients in high-end commercial matters before the High Court, Court of Appeal and Supreme Court of New Zealand.

Tom holds dual degrees in Law and International Relations, and is a qualified lawyer in New Zealand and Hong Kong. He is a frequent guest speaker and panellist throughout Asia on the topics of dispute funding, litigation and arbitration. Tom was a member of the Working Group that established and launched the Indian Association of Litigation Funders (IALF) in 2021. He is also a regular commentator in the media and is recognised as an industry frontrunner in leading directories, including Chambers and Partners Litigation Support 2020-2024, a ‘notable practitioner’ Chambers and Partners 2021 - 2024 Litigation Funding: International Arbitration Guides, Who’s Who Legal: Thought Leaders Third-Party Funding 2020-2024, Lawdragon Global 100 Leaders in Legal Finance 2021-2024 Guides and Lawdragon Global Restructuring Advisors & Consultants 2020 Guide.
